translated: The Museum of Roman Civilization (Museo della Civilta Romana) is located in Rome's EUR district, which was to host the World Exhibition in Rome in 1942.
original: Le musée de la Civilisation romaine (Museo della Civiltà Romana) est situé à Rome, dans le quartier de l'EUR, qui devait accueillir l'Exposition universelle de Rome, en 1942.
